question: Which two are true about authentication? (Choose two.)

options.A: Form-based logins should NOT be used with HTTP
options.B: When using Basic Authentication the target server is NOT authenticated.
options.C: J2EE compliant web containers are NOT required to support the HTTPS protocol.
options.D: Web containers are required to support unauthenticated access to unprotected web resources.
options.E: Form-based logins should NOT be used when sessions are maintained by cookies or SSL session information.
